game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the lost amulet and return it to the quest giver, Wizard Gandalf
game.description: Long ago, a powerful amulet was lost in the depths of the Forbidden Forest. Many have tried to find it, but none have succeeded. The wise old wizard seeks a brave adventurer's help. Will you be the one to retrieve it?
game.reward: Ancient knowledge and a magic artifact

task.description: The Forbidden Forest is a dark and dangerous place filled with mythical creatures. Be cautious as you navigate and avoid getting lost near the village entrance.
The amulet was seen last in a hidden chamber deep within the abandoned castle's ruins. Search for clues amidst the Forbidden Forest.
task.location: In the heart of the Forbidden Forest

task.description: The amulet is guarded by a powerful force. Test your skills and determination to overcome it.
task.location: At the center of the ancient ruins

task.objective: Return the amulet to Wizard Gandalf's tower
task.description: After securing the amulet, return it to the wizard in his village tower to ensure its proper use.
task.location: Wizard Gandalf's tower in the village
